title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 645-7.1 - Purpose and intent
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 645-7.1 - Purpose and intent

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to collect regulatory fees, in accordance with the requirements of ECL, section 43-0125, to fund the costs
of regulation, management and conservation activities which assure the
protection and continued beneficial use of the resources of the
park. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
645-7.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
